snippet.title: Sports Shooting USA on Dreamcast - Atomiswave to Dreamcast Conversion! - Long Play
snippet.description:
SUPPORT THE CHANNEL : http://www.patreon.com/VideoGameEsoterica

Well isn't this impressive!

I conjectured last year in a video that I thought Atomiswave to Dreamcast conversions would be possible if someone would look into it...and here we are!

Hopefully this leads to a ton more Atomiswave to Dreamcast conversions :) It's always great when people dedicate their time to projects like this; everyone learns more and the preservation and community grow more! 

Sports Shooting USA is an absolute challenging blast of an arcade light gun game! It's got the difficulty and speed related challenges of Point Blank with some serious high score battle action going on. Highly recommend it!

THIS IS THE FULL GAME :)

https://www.dreamcast-talk.com/forum/app.php/portal

http://www.patreon.com/VideoGameEsoterica

Questions? Comments? Just leave them below and I will do my best to answer each and every one of them!

You can follow us at IG : ChicagoGameCollector , or join our Discord Server : https://discord.gg/vGbsBzJ

VGE
